  • Field Details

    • rowsAffected

      public static int rowsAffected

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String itemName, float price)
      The constructor for the item class. It is not used but has been included for the sake of completeness.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The description of the menu item.
      price - The price of the item.

  • Method Details

    • createNewItem

      public static void createNewItem(Connection connection, Scanner input) throws SQLException
      This method handles the creation of new menu items.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      input - The Scanner instance from the main method needed to read user input with the help of the UserInput utility class.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findItemName

      public static String findItemName(Connection connection, int itemId) throws SQLException
      A method to find an items name from its unique item id. This method is used in the display and invoice functionalities.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here by the PreparedStatement.
      itemId - A unique identification number for a menu item.
      Returns:
      The name of the item identified by the itemId.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • findItemPrice

      public static double findItemPrice(Connection connection, int itemId) throws SQLException
      A method to find an item's price from its unique item id. It is used as a utility in the ItemsOrder .addItemToOrder method as well as the display and print invoice functionalities of the program that resides as utilities in the Order class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      itemId - The unique id number for the menu item.
      Returns:
      The price of the item based on its unique id number.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.

    • performFieldUpdate

      public static void performFieldUpdate(Connection connection, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue, double newValueDouble, String typeOfData, int itemId) throws SQLException
      A generic method to update any field in the item table. This method is used as a utility in the performFieldUpdate method in the main file of the program. This method is invoked from the main method.
      Parameters:
      connection - The Connection resource from the main method needed here for the PreparedStatement.
      fieldToUpdate - The name in string format of the field that must be updated.
      newValue - The new string value of the field (if applicable). The data type depends on the field and there is an if/else statement to handle different data types differently.
      newValueDouble - The new double value of the field (if applicable). The same handling applies as with newValue above.
      typeOfData - The type of data of the new value to enable different handling.
      itemId - The unique id number of the menu item.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the underlying MySQL service fails.
